stages.logText: You found Hettar, a tough boy at about your age, on top of the mountain. He kept calling for a certain Norry.
Hettar's little dog Norry had run away. He is very anxious for him. You promised to get Norry back.
Hettar gives you one of Norry's bones.
You offered Hettar's bone to the Norry. He took it eagerly.
Hettar thanked you a thousend times. He would leave to Blackwater Settlement again.
You explained to Hettar, that you had killed Norry. Hettar broke down to the floor in agony.
